scripts.setup: cd api && bundle install && ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/api/.env" ./.env && ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/.data" ./.data && ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/.claude" ./.claude && ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/screenshots" ./screenshots && bin/rails db:prepare
